name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Technical Engineer with 13+ years of experience in providing top-tier customer support and optimizing SaaS solutions. Proficient in SQL for data management and skilled in using tools like **Metabase**, **Zendesk**, **Linear**, and **JIRA** to streamline operations and enhance user experience. Demonstrated aptitude for troubleshooting technical issues and delivering effective solutions while ensuring robust communication and teamwork.

Accomplished Full Stack Developer experienced in building high-performance applications for the healthcare and financial sectors. Strong technical expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on knowledge in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Capable of leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native deployments and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Well-versed in compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, alongside a strong background in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
